channel.title: Hard Drives?
channel.description: Alright I have an external hard drive and my built in one. The problem is that somehow when i reinstalled windows it thinks my external drive is my C:/ drive and my normal drive is my F:/ drive. I also have another partition named D:/ but that does not matter. Anyways my problem with this is that everything is installed on my F:/ drive but someone things install onto my C:/ drive which is annoying the hell out of me because it is spamming my drive with random shit. So an ideas on how to fix that?

item.title: Hard Drives?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Edit the drive labels?

Read full topic

item.title: Hard Drives?

item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Uninstall windows, then install it again with the external hard drive out?

Read full topic

item.title: Hard Drives?

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Alright I have an external hard drive and my built in one. The problem is that somehow when i reinstalled windows it thinks my external drive is my C:/ drive and my normal drive is my F:/ drive. I also have another partition named D:/ but that does not matter. Anyways my problem with this is that everything is installed on my F:/ drive but someone things install onto my C:/ drive which is annoying the hell out of me because it is spamming my drive with random shit. So an ideas on how to fix that?
